panels.description: Anzahl der Events, die Logprep schafft aus kafka sich abzuholen.  Ereigniss pro Sekunde je Logprep Prozess.
panels.title: Durchsatz / Prozess

panels.description: Processing times of input connector.
panels.title: Input Processing Times

panels.description: Duration of all connector and pipeline processing times combined.
panels.title: Total Processing Times

panels.description: Stellt die Ratio von eingehenden und ausgehenden Logs dar. Im Falle der Verwendung des Selective Extractors muss beachtet werden, dass immer doppelt so viele Logs ausgehen geschrieben werden. Gleiches gilt fÃ¼r Logs mit vielen Pseudonymen oder SREs.
panels.title: Input/Output Ratio

panels.description: The increase of number of incoming events
panels.title: Incoming Events

panels.description: Gibt an, wieviel logs grad in der Queue sind
panels.title: Queue Size

panels.description: The increase of number of warnings in the selected time range
panels.title: Warnings

panels.description: Shows the currently active config version of logprep, if specified.
panels.title: Config Version

panels.description: Anzahl der Events, die Logprep schafft aus kafka sich abzuholen.  Ereigniss pro Sekunde.
panels.title: Durchsatz Gesamt

panels.description: Average processing times of all output connectors
panels.title: Output Processing Times

panels.description: Is the sum of the whole pipeline: parsing event, passing it through the pipeline and sending it to the output connector.
panels.title: Pipeline Processing Times

panels.description: Anzahl der laufenden Pipeline Prozesse
panels.title: Process Count

panels.description: The increase of number of outgoing events
panels.title: Outgoing Events

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows the currently active logprep version.
panels.title: Logprep Version

panels.description: Shows the per-second average of processed events per connector.
panels.title: Processed Event Rate per Connector per Second

panels.description: Shows the difference between processed and failed events as a per-second average. Failed events are events that couldn't be parsed or where processors/rules canceled the processing due to an error.
panels.title: Success/Failed Event Rate per Output per Second

panels.description: Shows the processing time per connector
panels.title: Processing Time Per Connector
